    • Method Detail

      • union

        public QueryBuilder union(QueryExpressionBody another)
        Description copied from interface: QueryBuilder

        Adds UNION between current query and the given query. Then makes resulting query the current query.

        This is equivalent on calling QueryBuilder.union(SetQuantifier, QueryExpressionBody) and giving SetQuantifier.DISTINCT as first parameter.

        Specified by:
        union in interface QueryBuilder
        Parameters:
        another - The query to perform UNION with.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • union

        public QueryBuilder union(CorrespondingSpec correspondingSpec,
                          QueryExpressionBody another)
        Description copied from interface: QueryBuilder

        Adds UNION <correspondingSpec> between current query and the given query. Then makes resulting query the current query.

        This is equivalent on calling QueryBuilder.union(SetQuantifier, CorrespondingSpec, QueryExpressionBody) and giving SetQuantifier.DISTINCT as first parameter.

        Specified by:
        union in interface QueryBuilder
        Parameters:
        correspondingSpec - The column correspondence specification.
        another - The query to perform UNION with.
        Returns:
        This builder.

      • union

        public QueryBuilder union(SetQuantifier setQuantifier,
                          QueryExpressionBody another)
        Description copied from interface: QueryBuilder

        Adds UNION <setQuantifier> between current query and the given query. Then makes resulting query the current query.

        This is equivalent on calling QueryBuilder.union(SetQuantifier, CorrespondingSpec, QueryExpressionBody) and giving null as second parameter.

        Specified by:
        union in interface QueryBuilder
        Parameters:
        setQuantifier - The set quantifier for this union.
        another - The query to perform UNION with.
        Returns:
        This builder.
